Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Central
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Central, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson, Central, Madison, Laramie, Jackson, and resume normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Jackson, Laramie, Madison, Central, Jackson,  and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Eastbound #87 87th Temporary Reroute near Buffalo/88th
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted near Buffalo/88th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Buffalo, 88th, Mackinaw, 90th, Buffalo, and resume normal route, due to, street blockage near Buffalo/88th.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Jefferson Park due to a sick customer.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

between Forest Park and Jefferson Park, and,
between O'Hare and Harlem, only.
Shuttle buses are available between Harlem (O'Hare) and Jefferson Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
